data.oai_dc:dc: Abies, Alisma, Alnus glutinosa, Alnus incana, Artemisia, Asteroideae, Betula nana, Betula pendula, Betula pubescens, Betula tortuosa, Betula undifferentiated, Bryales, Caryophyllaceae, Chenopodiaceae, Corylus, Cruciferae, Cyperaceae, Cystopteris fragilis, DEPTH, sediment/rock, Diphasium alpinum, Diphasium complanatum, Dryopteris carthusiana, Dryopteris cristata, Equisetum, Ericales, Galium, Geum, Gramineae, Huperzia selago, Indeterminable: unknown, Kochia laniflora, Leguminosae, Lycopodium clavatum, Lycopodium dubium, Menyanthes trifoliata, MEZHGOR, Mezhgornoe, Russia, Myriophyllum spicatum, Nuphar, Onagraceae, Picea, Pinus sylvestris, Polygonaceae, Polypodiaceae, Polypodium vulgare, Potamogeton, Primulaceae, Quercus, Ranunculaceae, Rosaceae, RSAMP, Rumex, Russian sampler, Salix, Salsola kali, Saxifragaceae, Scrophulariaceae, Selaginella selaginoides, Sparganium, Sphagnum, Thalictrum, Thickness, Tilia, Typha angustifolia, Ulmus, Umbelliferae
